app.p: Supplementary data associated with this article are available online. X-ray crystallographic data and copies of 31P, 1H, and 13C NMR spectra for all compounds synthesized are presented. Table S2: Essential crystallographic data of the 11a and 12a ∙H 2O single-crystal diffraction experiments and model refinements.
